snippet: A look at Rupert Murdoch's legal confidant, Joel I. Klein; in France, an economic ally for the White House; and with more litigation on the horizon, Google's Android marches on.
abstract: A look at Rupert Murdoch's legal confidant, Joel I. Klein; in France, an economic ally for the White House; and with more litigation on the horizon, Google's Android marches on.

headline.main: Business Day Live: Steering Murdoch in Scandal
